programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 13
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: Arjuna Cintanya Gak Pernah Berchandya
programme.desc: Ayu (Nabila Zavira) already has a boyfriend, but her father, who loves Javanese puppetry, doesn't like her boyfriend. Then, Ayu meets a handsome young man wearing an Anoman costume, but Ayu thinks he's playing a trick on her. It turns out that while she's undergoing training for a teacher promotion, Ayu meets the young man who loves Javanese art again, and their suitcases even get swapped.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 33
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.desc: Due to similar names, Indah Permatasari ended up transporting the wrong person in her online taxi. The problem was that the person being transported was a successful young entrepreneur like Dimas Anggara, who was rushing to the inauguration of his 11th branch. Will Indah and Dimas give her five stars? Or will they report her to their company and get fired? Or will they just make her their girlfriend?

programme.desc: Farel's car was confiscated, forcing him to travel by motorcycle. On the road, Farel met Alin, who was in a hurry and suddenly got on her motorcycle, but Farel's motorcycle broke down. Alin and Farel met again on campus after Farel was accused of peeping in the women's restroom. Farel held a grudge against Alin and often bullied her.

programme.title: Generasi Gamerz - EP 3
programme.desc: Dua selebriti "Gamerz" akan bekerjasama dengan ibu atau bapa mereka untuk bertanding di dalam cabaran permainan video popular seperti Mobile Legends, FIFA20 & banyak lagi!

programme.title: Kisah Tok Kadi S1 - EP 8

programme.title: Pok Ya Cong Codei Memburu Siti - EP 14
programme.desc: Selepas ditinggalkan Siti, Pok Ya tidak berhasrat untuk mencarinya sehinggalah mendapat tahu Siti sedang mengandungkan anaknya. Misi menjejaki Siti semakin tegang setelah mengetahui dia sebenarnya diculik!

programme.title: Isteri Halal - EP 50
programme.desc: Zain buntu dengan nasib Eyra, dan berharap Adellia tidak akan membuat laporan polis. Mak Pah berang apabila Aziz mahu melambatkan tarikh pernikahan. Rasyid mahu mencari duit yang hilang.

programme.title: Naluri Hati - EP 7
programme.desc: Pada hari perkahwinannya, Dinda teragak-agak kerana dia akan berkahwin dengan orang yang tidak dicintainya. Namun, satu kejadian berlaku dan menyebabkan Dinda mengalami amnesia separa.

programme.title: RASA Anak Emak Anak Bapak - EP 4
programme.desc: Program masakan ini memerlukan selebriti jemputan membawa ibu atau bapa mereka menjelajah Malaysia bagi merasa sendiri masakan kegemaran ibu bapa masing-masing.

programme.title: Tolonglah, Cik B! - EP 5
programme.desc: Cik B diberi ‘lesen’ untuk meninggalkan rumahnya bersama seorang rakan hos, dan mereka bersama akan meneroka aktiviti hobi & sukan baru dan menarik sambil kita mengenali Cik B dengan lebih mendalam.

programme.title: Pengantin Lelaki Untuk Cik Gadis - EP 9
programme.desc: Kecewa dengan impian untuk bergelar tentera, Kris al-Hadi ke ladang Tok Abah. Pertemuan dengan Salsabila, gadis malang yang difitnah hingga terpenjara telah menimbulkan rasa simpati dan cinta.

programme.title: Renovate - EP 8
programme.desc: Dihoskan oleh Daiyan Trisha, dia akan mencari rumah yang asalnya biasa atau lama tetapi telah diubahsuai menjadi cantik dengan bantuan arkitek yang berpengalaman.

programme.title: Kampung Pom Pom Letops - EP 5
programme.desc: Elly Mazlein atau dikenali sebagai Kak Lina Pom Pom menjemput tetamu jemputan yang terdiri daripada duda dan jejaka idaman Malaya.

programme.title: Roti Cicah Susu - EP 10
programme.desc: Empat orang anak yatim terpisah. Selepas 15 tahun, mereka bertemu semula dan cuba untuk mencari jawapan tentang apa yang berlaku sehingga membuka banyak rahsia yang tak sepatutnya diketahui.

programme.title: Lara Oh Lara! - EP 7
programme.desc: Lara Oh Lara membawakan kepada anda aksi lucu dan comel Lara Alana dalam kehidupan sehariannya. Dipenuhi gelak tawa dan kecomelan anak kepada pasangan Awal Asha'ari dan Scha Al-Yahya khas untuk anda

programme.title: Perang Periuk - EP 7
programme.desc: Rancangan memasak yang unik di mana ibu mentua akan bertarung dengan menantu perempuan untuk memenangi hati juri-juri dan orang yang tersayang dengan masakan mereka.

programme.title: Yuna Bintang Di Langit - EP 1
programme.desc: Ikuti Yuna meneruskan kerjayanya dalam bidang muzik di sekeliling Malaysia, Los Angeles & San Diego dengan kandungan eksklusif

programme.title: Syurga Itu Bukan Mudah - EP 17
programme.desc: Aileen terpaksa pulang ke rumah Umira sebagai syarat Farid tak sebarkan video lucahnya. Aminah dah tahu yang Farid terlalu toksik untuk anaknya dan bertekad nak tolong Aileen lepaskan diri.

programme.title: Syurga Itu Bukan Mudah - EP 18
programme.desc: Farid tahu Mustafa sengaja nak perangkap dia dan belasah Arman. Aileen buat laporan polis terhadapnya. Farid tanya apa yang Aileen mahu dan Aileen beritahu perkara yang dia sangat nak iaitu diceraikan.

programme.title: Syurga Itu Bukan Mudah - EP 19

programme.title: Rustom
programme.desc: Rustom, a naval officer, and Cynthia, his wife, are happily married. However, their lives change when he discovers her affair and is accused of murdering Vikram, her lover.

programme.title: Acharya
programme.desc: Enraged by the murders committed by the municipal leader of Dharmasthali, Acharya, a social reformer, vows to take revenge for his friend, Siddha. Fights and corruption ensue as secrets get revealed.

programme.title: Baar Baar Dekho
programme.desc: What if we get the chance to rectify all the big mistakes of our life? Jai's futuristic time travel helps him do so. Release Year: 2016 Director: Nitya Mehra Awards: 2017 WinnerReader's Choice- Best Choreographer- Bosco MartisFor the Song 'Kala Chashma', 2016 WinnerNickelodeon Kids' Choice Award- Favorite Movie Song

programme.title: Shaadi Mein Zaroor Aana
programme.desc: Aarti agreed to marry Satyendar. However, she left when she learned she couldn't work afterward. Aarti valued her independence and career, leading her to choose her ambitions over the marriage. Release Year: 2017 Director: Ratnaa Sinha

programme.title: Akele Hum Akele Tum
programme.desc: Two aspiring singers, Rohit and Kiran, fall in love and get married. Soon, the burden of responsibilities cripples the marriage and Kiran decides to part ways with Rohit. Release Year: 1995 Director: Mansoor Khan

programme.title: Tejas
programme.desc: Indian Air Force officer Tejas embarks on a risky mission to rescue an Indian spy from Pakistan. Along the way, she battles both formidable adversaries and haunting personal demons from her past. Release Year: 2023 Director: Sarvesh Mewara

programme.title: Jabariya Jodi
programme.desc: Abhay, a righteous thug, forcefully kidnaps grooms who demand dowry and later marries them off. Babli, his childhood sweetheart, re-enters his life and changes his priorities. Release Year: 2019 Director: Prashant Singh

programme.title: Gaami
programme.desc: Shankar, an amnesiac Aghori who suffers from the fear of touch, goes on a dangerous Himalayan trail in search of a mythical cure for his condition. What happens when his past uncovers the way for him?

programme.title: Love, Sitara
programme.desc: A love story between a Malayali girl and a Punjabi chef, complicated by the family members on each side. Release Year: 2024 Director: Vandana Kataria

programme.title: Baa Baaa Black Sheep
programme.desc: Baa Baaa Black Sheep is a 2018 Indian action comedy film, starring Anupam Kher, Manish Paul, Annu Kapoor, Manjari Phadnis and Kay Kay Menon in a lead roles. Release Year: 2018 Director: Vishwas Paandya

programme.title: Jabariya Jodi
programme.desc: Abhay, a righteous thug, forcefully kidnaps grooms who demand dowry and later marries them off. Babli, his childhood sweetheart, re-enters his life and changes his priorities. Release Year: 2019 Director: Prashant Singh

programme.title: Gaami
programme.desc: Shankar, an amnesiac Aghori who suffers from the fear of touch, goes on a dangerous Himalayan trail in search of a mythical cure for his condition. What happens when his past uncovers the way for him?

programme.title: Aakhree Raasta
programme.desc: Released from prison after 24 years for a crime he did not commit, David discovers that the people who framed him are now prominent citizens. Release Year: 1986 Director: Bhagyaraj

programme.title: Salaam Venky
programme.desc: Venky suffers from a rare type of muscular dystrophy and wants to donate his organs. With his mother's support, he petitions for legalising euthanasia. Will his wish be granted in the court of law? Release Year: 2022 Director: Revathi

programme.title: Badla
programme.desc: Naina, successful entrepreneur and married woman, a web of accusations when her lover is found dead. She then hires a reputable lawyer to work with her on the case and find answers. Release Year: 2019 Director: Sujoy Ghosh Awards: 2020 Winner Jury's Choice Award- Best ActreSS- Taapsee Pannu, 2019 Winner Style And Culture Award- Excellence in Acting- Taapsee Pannu

programme.title: Hero No. 1
programme.desc: A wealthy business heir plights his troth to household chores for the sake of love. Posing as Raju, the man of many talents, he sweeps, mops, cooks, sings, and dances his way into the hearts of his girlfriend's near and dear ones. Release Year: 1997 Director: David Dhawan

programme.title: 7 Hours To Go
programme.desc: After losing his fiancee, enraged Arjun kidnaps 7 people and gives the police limited time to find evidence for a murder against Kabeer Khemlka, a businessman, and save hostages. Release Year: 2016 Director: Saurabh Varma

programme.title: Pratikar
programme.desc: Krishna embarks on a quest to avenge the tragic death of his foster sister. However, things take an unexpected turn when his foster brother begins to pursue him for taking the law into his own hands.

programme.title: Kahan Shuru Kahan Khatam
programme.desc: A woman rejects her arranged marriage, sparking a chaotic chase as she tries to escape the wedding, while the groom and his family try to catch her.

programme.title: Ab Tak Chhappan 2
programme.desc: Sadhu Agashe, a retired encounter specialist, faces a series of challenges after he returns to Mumbai to solve various criminal cases growing in the city.

programme.title: Helmet
programme.desc: A quirky comedy from the heartland of India, it touches upon a topic that is considered embarrassing for most people in India and will showcase the same in a hilariously entertaining manner.

programme.title: Parineeta
programme.desc: The lifelong romance between Lolita (Vidya Balan) and Shekar (Saif Ali Khan) is upset by the arrival of another man.

programme.title: Mission Kashmir
programme.desc: A police officer adopts the son and sole survivor of a family he has massacred while pursuing a terrorist. After some time the foster son finds out what the stepfather did.

programme.title: Jawani Zindabad
programme.desc: Determined to eradicate the social evil of dowry from society, Shashi marries her sister to Ravi without offering dowry. However, his insistence leads to a series of unfortunate attacks from society.

programme.title: Setters
programme.desc: Apurva Chaudhary and his team leak several examination papers and make huge profits out of it. Meanwhile, Aditya Singh and his team of honest officers attempt to catch the criminals.

programme.title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa 2

Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: La Famille Blaireau-Renard - EP 25

programme.desc: Four best friends have a secret: after school, they climb up to their hidden tree house. It contains a priceless treasure: books! Each day, the children tell one another stories, travelling to exciting fairy-tale worlds.

programme.desc: To gain a better understanding of some professions, school children explain jobs to their parents in their own words.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires - EP 15
programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Ines and Isa lead a double life: ordinary girls at court, training in secret to be the best fighters in the kingdom. The 3 Musketeers, that's them! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they foil plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires - EP 16

programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule - EP 27
programme.desc: Maths exam. Manolo procrastinates and tries to persuade Felix and Lounis to try the effortless method. Flavie takes inspiration from a fight with Pierre-Charles and eve to write a novel.

programme.title: Tamia - EP 25
programme.desc: Tamia is a courageous young girl who does nothing without careful thought. She wants to be a mediator between parents and their children, a voice for those without one. Helped by friends Audrey, Sara, Yao and Cheick, she enjoys plenty of adventures, taking her young audience on a veritable journey.

programme.title: Magazine
programme.desc: TV5MONDE, the global French language network, offers the best television programmes from France, Belgium, Switzerland and Canada.

programme.title: 36.9° - EP 6
programme.desc: Smell is the first sense to develop in the fetus and it is essential for the development of newborns. Recently, it was discovered that humans have 400 olfactory receptors. But what happens when we lose our sense of smell?

programme.title: Objectif Monde L'hebdo - EP 12
programme.desc: How can we explain the global success of running? Danny Lemieux, who has twenty-five years' running experience under his belt, has set himself the target of completing the famous 42.195 km of a marathon in under four hours. An opportunity to sort out the truth from the lies about the different ways of improving sporting performance.

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-Moi Ta Maison ! - EP 11
programme.desc: In the canton of Basel, we visit the home of Daniel, a fan of antiques who has built and decorated his house thanks to his passion for ancient objects. Then we discover the house of Paul, who has turned an electric transformer station into a home.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Cote d'Azur.

programme.title: Suisse En Scene
programme.desc: Interview with a key figure from the Swiss cultural scene. An opportunity to look back at their life and career, and the foundations that underpin their work.

programme.title: Rassemblance - EP 19
programme.desc: As an artist in Kabul, the young Shakiba feared for her life. After several years in the 'Theatre du soleil' company, this Afghan actress and activist wants to help build bridges between the culture of her roots and France.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match - EP 64
programme.desc: Meeting with Adrien Maire, a cyclist from Nice and member of the Unibet Tietema Rockets team.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Papilles - EP 19
programme.desc: A journey rich in flavour through the regions and their terroirs, exploring local specialities and meeting the artisans perpetuating their age-old culinary traditions. An opportunity to stop off in the kitchen of a talented chef to prepare an emblematic regional recipe.

programme.title: Hep Taxi !
programme.desc: In town or in the countryside, day or night, Jerome Colin, the presenter-taxi driver leads his prestigious customer on a four-wheel journey conducive to secrets.

programme.title: Le Coeur A L'elevage
programme.desc: Lauriane Henchoz, 17 years old, raises Holstein dairy cows. On her farm in Yverdon, the young apprentice embodies the richness of a living heritage and the challenges of an essential profession.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion

programme.title: Les Nouveaux Boss - EP 1
programme.desc: The very first pan-African audiovisual competition for entrepreneurs. For eight weeks, sixteen candidates from all over Africa will be accompanied by four exceptional mentors as they develop their project: Claude Borna, A'Salfo, Nicole Sulu and Yassine Laghzioui. A number of celebrities will also come to talk about their experiences, including champion Teddy Riner.

His friends, convinced he's innocent, decide to give him an alibi. But will the group withstand the police investigation?

programme.title: FANZONE - FRI 05 DEC (Live)
programme.desc: This is the show that puts international fans at the heart of the Premier League conversation. We connect with fans from around the world as they share their views on their teams and favourite players.

programme.title: PREVIEW - FRI 05 DEC
programme.desc: This week on Preview, we cast ahead to Matchweek 15, kicking-off as Aston Villa face Arsenal, Newcastle travel to Burnley, and Monday's closer with Wolves hosting Manchester United.

programme.title: WELCOME TO THE WEEKEND - FRI 05 DEC
programme.desc: There's Access All Areas at Brentford as Shay Given gets thrown into a training session, while Caoimhin Kelleher and Keith Andrews give him a tour of the training ground. programme.title: The Big Interview 2025/26 - EP 17
programme.desc: Few players have left a legacy in the Premier League quite like Gianfranco Zola. A magician on the pitch, with a personality that made him loved off it too. Revered at Chelsea, his number 25 wasn't worn for another 20 years after he left the club after he helped the Blues to two FA Cup triumphs and UEFA Super Cup and Cup Winners Cup success.

programme.title: PL Stories 2025/26 - EP 27
programme.desc: We sit down for an exclusive interview with the second of two new Premier League Hall of fame inductees, Gary Neville. From his journey from Class of ’92 prodigy to Premier League Hall of Fame icon, he talks us through the moments that defined his legacy at Manchester United. A story on one of the league’s most influential right-backs and a leader whose impact still shapes English football today.

programme.title: Tottenham Hotspur vs Brentford (MW15) - EP 146
programme.desc: Spurs have lost just one of their eight Premier League meetings with Brentford (W4 D3), winning each of the last three in a row.

programme.title: Leeds United vs Liverpool (MW15) - EP 147
programme.desc: Leeds have won just one of their last 12 Premier League games against Liverpool (D3 L8), beating them 2-1 at Anfield in October 2022.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Sunderland (MW15) - EP 144
programme.desc: Sunderland have never won away in 13 attempts against Manchester City in the Premier League (D2 L11). Their last away top-flight win there was in December 1981 at Maine Road.

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Arsenal (MW15) - EP 141
programme.desc: Since their return to the competition in 2019, Aston Villa have won five of their 12 Premier League games against Arsenal (D1 L6), as many as they had in their previous 45 against the Gunners before relegation (D14 L26).

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Garreth McLellan vs. Dricus Du Plessis
programme.desc: Check out exciting action from MMA organizations around the world. This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts in South Africa including two fighters duke it out for the EFC Worldwide Middleweight Championship in Garreth "Soldier Boy" McLellan vs. Dricus "Stillknocks" Du Plessis. Bonus coverage includes Texier Kabesa vs. Luke Michael from Durban, South Africa.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Timothy Bradley vs. Luis Carlos Abregu
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a bout between 2 undefeated fighters, Timothy 'Desert Storm' Bradley (25-0, 11 KOs) vs. Luis Carlos Abregu, aka 'El Potro' (29-0, 23 KOs) from the Agua Caliente Casino, Rancho Mirage in California, USA on July 17, 2010.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Mike Tyson vs. Sammy Scaff
programme.desc: The talk of the boxing world takes center stage as a young Mike Tyson displays the lethal combination of speed and power that would later make him a World Champion. Tyson enters the Felt Forum in New York City with a 13-0 record, having knocked out every opponent he's faced thus far, with 9 of those knockouts coming in the first round.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paul Williams vs. Antonio Margarito
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a WBO welterweight title bout featuring then-undefeated Paul Williams and Antonio Margarito. It's a closely scored bout, but one fighter's push towards a strong finish may have put him ahead just enough.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Mitakeumi, Takakeisho, Goeido and Asanoyama from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Todd Foster
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (47-3-0 21 KO) faces Todd Foster (33-3-0 29 KO) in a 12-round contest for the vacant IBC Welterweight Title from Atlantic City New Jersey USA.

programme.title: WCCB Janibek Alimkhanuly vs. Anauel Ngamissengue
programme.desc: Undefeated WBO and IBF Middleweight World Champion Janibek Alimkhanuly will look to defend his titles in his home country of Kazakhstan when he faces fellow undefeated middleweight Anauel Ngamissengue of France. programme.desc: Glitch and his grimbots have a long race on a very long wall - the Great Wall of China!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 48
programme.desc: Bluey, Bingo and Mum get into a debate with Dad about the definition of teasing. As they recall all the times where he's been a Big Teaser, Dad argues that he was only just playing.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 51
programme.desc: The Heelers gather for a classic Aussie Christmas. Bluey gets a new teddy and introduces him to the whole family, but the family play too rough with him and now he wants to go home.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Andy and Jen are sent to North America to check on a swift fox mum who has been left to bring up four cubs on her own.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S3) - EP 8
programme.desc: Guide dog Kika and her owner Dr Amit are off to the Sticks n' Stuff shop with Amit's friend Alana, who is also blind, to help her buy a new white cane.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild (S1) - EP 10
programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar give fruit bats some breakfast and watch them fly around in the dark. The next animal they meet is the barn owl, which lives in a very similar way to the bats.

programme.title: Playtime Towers (S1) - EP 5
programme.desc: Bella and Lift visit the Cloud Kitchen, where Patch is busy with the Playtimers making a tasty treat called Munchy Muddy Meadows.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 12
programme.desc: The Squirrels have fun learning what opposites are, with help from their animal friends!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 11
programme.desc: The Squirrels decide to start their own radio show.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 10
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels go on a mission to contain an outbreak.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 31
programme.desc: When lightning strikes Academy Island, it causes a power cut. Can the Go Jetters rescue their trapped friends without the power they need to call for Click-ons?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 30
programme.desc: The team's Pan-American road trip leads them to discover that Glitch is building a road through the Darien Gap. Can they save this important habitat and protect the local sloths?

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S23) - EP 10
programme.desc: After Thomas makes a mistake with an important silk delivery in India, he causes chaos and confusion by not seeking help.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 39
programme.desc: Sarah and Duck explore a Winter Fair in the park, and discover an amazing skating rink inside a giant snowball!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 1
programme.desc: The Shallots want to explore beyond the front garden, so Sarah comes up with a plan.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 38
programme.desc: Myrtle declares Stanley Mayor for a day. He soon finds there is a dance class and new barn to open with lots of ribbon cutting, and he even fits in making a Bowling alley.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 37
programme.desc: Stanley helps Hettie with a sleepover at the museum for some of the children. They do a treasure hunt and a night-time picnic, but antics ensue when they clean up after themselves.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 45
programme.desc: Monty is struggling to make a huge gift for Jimmy Jones and starts to wonder if the best things might come in small packages.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 27
programme.desc: JoJo wonders why the moon is a funny shape. Gran Gran explains why the moon appears to change shape in the night sky, and together they make a moon diary for JoJo to take home.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 37
programme.desc: The Heelers and Lucky's family get together to watch the big game, a fun family experiences that gets a little tense.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 38
programme.desc: In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 39
programme.desc: In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 15
programme.desc: The Squirrels are transported into the future where they encounter a robot Duggee!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 14
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn that friends can be like an extended family.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 5
programme.desc: King Tiger and the Jelly wonder what Duggee has planned for today. Tag wants a snack, Enid has a musical cheese chase, and Norrie has a haircut.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 11
programme.desc: Glitch and his grimbots have a long race on a very long wall - the Great Wall of China!

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S2) - EP 6
programme.desc: Fitness guru, Garlic, has a set of fun exercises to make you stronger.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S2) - EP 5
programme.desc: The fabulous Avocados sing an operatic piece in their three unique voices.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 12
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of Supertato, the world's first potato superhero as he tackles the mischievous Evil Pea, in the supermarket aisles.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: Evil Pea plunges Broccoli and Carrot into the doughnut toppings simultaneously and Supertato almost quits being a Superhero when he can't save his two friends at the same time.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 26
programme.desc: The Go Jetters visit London on New Year's Eve, but Big Ben is missing! To the Vroomster!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 43
programme.desc: A game of hide and seek threatens to topple the fairy chimneys of Cappadocia in Turkey.

programme.desc: While working on the Brazilian Railway, Thomas Meets Gustavo, another big blue engine who reminds him of Gordon back home.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S23) - EP 15
programme.desc: Darcy the tunnel boring machine makes some mistakes on her first day, but she soon makes up for it when everyone sees what she can really do.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S24) - EP 3
programme.desc: When a Railway Show for little engines comes to Sodor, an overly excited Percy finally sees his chance to shine.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S24) - EP 6
programme.desc: There's a fancy dress competition on the railways and while Thomas and the others are excited, Shankar doesn't want to join in.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S24) - EP 12
programme.desc: Thomas is asked to help find the inventor, Ruth, a new home and workshop on Sodor.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 51
programme.desc: Jeanie says going round in circles won't help find a missing key, but Monty isn't so sure.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S3) - EP 20

programme.desc: Scarf Lady's old film reels get themselves in a tangle, so Sarah and Duck decide to recreate the footage.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 36
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo are playing The Quiet Game and won't use words to tell Dad which toy to buy for Muffin. At his wit's end, Dad recruits new store clerk Alfie to help interpret the girls' miming.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 37

programme.desc: Gerbie the snake is on holiday and would like to see all the beautiful sights. Duggee can help, he does have his Tour Guide badge!

programme.desc: When Mum and Dad have a disagreement, Bluey makes Dad write a love letter to Mum to make up. Bluey must find a way to play Ground's Lava with Bingo and deliver the letter to Mum, without squabbling.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 - EP 325
programme.desc: Daring Danny's at it again, luckily the Pups are able to raise their rig after Danny sinks the Paw Patroller. // Ryder and the Pups pair up with Alex and his mini patrol to retrieve mysteriously missing items.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 - EP 809
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in search of an Antarctic treasure but they all need rescued when they get stranded on shore.

programme.title: DORA S1 - EP 112
programme.desc: Boots gets a Guayabera shirt as a gift for Tico, but becomes attached to it on the way to Tico's house. // Dora, Boots, and Papi want to see the Quetzal constellation dance across the sky, but it loses three stars! Dora has to get them back in time.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 - EP 204
programme.desc: While everyone sleeps peacefully, one may wonder what the Barbababies could be dreaming about. // To dream makes you grow... But what can Barbidur, Barbalala, Barbotine and Barbidou possibly dream of?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 - EP 107
programme.desc: It is pranks day. The Barbababies have fun finding new pranks... until Barbabright spots the track of a dinosaur.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 - EP 109
programme.desc: Tim does all he can to get the new DinoStar toy. // It's a day for practical jokes, but Tim doesn't know when to stop. // Tim and Dad have to catch a troublesome mole.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S9 - EP 904
programme.desc: Darington can't wait to ride the Great Rocketship Ride, the tallest, fastest carnival ride in all of Axle City! But when Darington's tickets blow away, he and Blaze must go on an epic adventure to retrieve them!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 - EP 122
programme.desc: Skye and Rocky go on their first camping trip, but when Chickaletta gets caught in a crevice, they have to call in the PAW Patrol. // Tons of baby turtles start to pop up all over town and it's up to Ryder and the Pups to get them back to their pond.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 - EP 123
programme.desc: Rubble decides to nap under a tree at Farmer Yumi's when suddenly Adventure Bay gets a huge problem - Alex the Giant! // When Cap'n Turbot needs to get a picture of a rare bird, his French cousin decides to help but gets caught on a cliff!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S12 - EP 1201
programme.desc: Skye, Liberty, Everest and Ranger Aspen head off on a road trip in the Adventure RV to attend a desert concert by their favorite Pop Star, Sierra Sparkle.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 - EP 306
programme.desc: It's Friend Appreciation Day! But when Speed Meister's gift for Mr. McTurtle goes awry, he has to call Rubble & Crew for help. / Rubble & Crew help Lucas make the most awesome Science Fair volcano ever. But will Wingsy get in the way of the eruption?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 - EP 307
programme.desc: When Motor needs help at the fire station, a new Fire Captain comes to town to help train all the pups as new firefighter recruits. // Charger can't wait to help Sierra Sparkle with her big show! Well, until his hurt paw causes a cone complication.

programme.title: DORA S1 - EP 107
programme.desc: Isa's throwing a party where everyone will be dancing the Rainforest Ritmo. Boots has to learn the dance before they get there! // Dora leads everyone into the Tricky Trappy Forest to recover Tico's magic nut that can turn into your favorite food.

Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3) - EP 25
programme.desc: For centuries, fantastic tales of terrifying monsters have fascinated mankind. Bizarre beasts of all shapes and sizes have been portrayed in some of history's most classic stories and folklore.

programme.title: Mysteries Unearthed With Danny Trejo (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: We explore some of the most valuable treasures found in the most unlikely of ways. Like an Ancient Roman mosaic hiding in an apartment, or a valuable piece of Americana tucked away in a flea market.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S2) - EP 3
programme.desc: I'm sure you've heard of an eye for an eye, but have you heard about some of the sweetest stories of revenge? Like the one about a man in Colorado that uses a "killdozer" to settle a zoning dispute.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S2) - EP 4
programme.desc: Have you heard about the warrior bear who helped the Allies win WWII? Or how about the real-life hobbit humans in ancient Indonesia? What if I told you gerbils were recruited to fight crime in jails?

programme.title: The Mega-Brands That Built The World (S2) - EP 7
programme.desc: Two sneaker companies become industry titans through a decades-long battle, as they unleash iconic footwear that will bring sneakers mainstream and make them part of the fabric of American culture.

programme.title: History's Greatest Escapes With Morgan Freeman (S2) - EP 15

programme.title: Women On Death Row - EP 6

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 1
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 2
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 1
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 2
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC’s ‘The Exchange’ is the newsroom-based program for today’s investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 1
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 2
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 1
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 2
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Fast Money - EP 1
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Fast Money - EP 2
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Managing Asia - EP 971
programme.desc: CNBC’s longest running feature show. For over 20 years Christine Tan has been talking to people who are shaping, governing and leading the Asia-Pacific region in this multi-award award winning show.

programme.title: CNBC On Assignment - EP 41
programme.desc: CNBC goes on assignment at the biggest events around the world, bringing you interviews and insight from the most influential leaders in business, politics, activism and the arts.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime rpt - EP 49
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Fast Money (rpt) - EP 97
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Channel Japan - EP 31
programme.desc: Channel Japan offers a fresh look at the latest in the economy, business, technology, culture and sightseeing of Japan.

programme.title: Executive Decisions - EP 5
programme.desc: ‘Executive Decisions’ is a CNBC podcast offering a rare window into the minds of top decision-makers. Hosted by Steve Sedgwick, each episode explores the pivotal choices that shape the careers and legacies of business leaders and policymakers. Through candid conversations about risk, doubt and conviction, the series reminds us that even the most powerful face uncertainty and trade-offs.

programme.title: American Greed - EP 116
programme.desc: "American Greed" goes inside the dark side of the American Dream - where money seduces, power corrupts, and smooth criminals will stop at nothing to get rich.

programme.title: CNBC Sports - PGA TOUR - EP 49
programme.desc: Highlights from the latest PGA TOUR tournament.

programme.title: W2RC 2025 Season Review - EP 1
programme.desc: Season review of the 2025 W2RC World Rally-Raid Championship.

programme.title: CNBC Sports - Le Marathon des Sables - EP 3
programme.desc: Since 1986, the MARATHON DES SABLES has crossed the world’s most stunning deserts with several unique concepts: MARATHON DES SABLES THE LEGENDARY (252 km in the Sahara Desert in Morocco), MARATHON DES SABLES (70, 100, or 120 km spread over 3 stages), and the new 2024 concept, MDS TREK (4 stages with a total distance of up to 120 km), offering an accessible adventure with optimal comfort.

programme.title: Spartan World Championships - EP 4
programme.desc: Spartan World Championship events are the pinnacle of OCR racing. Where the toughest athletes on the planet take on the hardest obstacles to earn legendary status. It starts with National Series events, progresses to a Regional Championship weekend, and culminates with our World Championship races.

programme.title: Late Night with Seth Meyers
programme.desc: Emmy Award-nominated "Late Night with Seth Meyers," hosted by award-winning writer and performer Seth Meyers, is home to incisive humor, topical jokes and A-list celebrity guests. The series’ signature "A Closer Look" segment has garnered millions of views and is widely lauded for its tightly written and thoughtful approach to analyzing and satirizing news of the day.

programme.title: Late Night with Seth Meyers
programme.desc: Emmy Award-nominated "Late Night with Seth Meyers," hosted by award-winning writer and performer Seth Meyers, is home to incisive humor, topical jokes and A-list celebrity guests. programme.title: CNBC Explains - EP 4
programme.desc: ‘CNBC Explains’ is a dynamic explainer series that dives deep into the forces shaping our world. Each episode unpacks complex business and economic topics, breaking them down into clear, compelling narratives. With expert insights, data-driven visuals and a global perspective, this series helps viewers understand not just what is happening, but why it matters.

programme.title: CNBC Sport: On The Record - EP 205

Each week, we sit down with the biggest names in sports - from league commissioners, team owners, influential media executives and top athletes - to give you an insider's perspective on the strategies, deals, and stories shaping sports and business.

programme.title: Samurai Drama Selections "Kumokiri Nizaemon Final" Eps. 7 (R)
programme.desc: Kumokiri Nizaemon, a thief-of-all-time and the leader of a gang of thieves. Without resorting to violence and leaving no trace behind, he brilliantly steals enormous sum of money from the wealthy. In this final chapter of the series, Nizaemon sets his sights on the hidden vault of Edo’s most powerful moneylender-and the legendary sword "Juzumaru Tsunetsugu".

programme.title: My Gardening (R)
programme.desc: Learn useful tips on gardening.

programme.title: Go Focus
programme.desc: An up-to-date information on the recent matches of the Go competitions along with easy to understand explanation on the various moves and techniques.

programme.title: NHK ACADEMIA
programme.desc: This is a lecture program in which top runners in various fields as lecturers speak professionally and uniquely on themes that "must be shared now more than ever". What is the "unshakable intellect" that they have arrived at by overcoming the anxieties and setbacks of their youth? Every month, we invite participants to join us for live online lectures.

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: Kid's Discovery (R)
programme.desc: In this program, children around the age of 4 can experience the pleasure of playing with friends, the wonder of life, the joy of doing thigs by themselves, and consideration for others, all while having fun through various discoveries.

programme.title: With Mother (R)
programme.desc: This children's program includes a puppet show, cartoon, music, and gymnastics in which children can participate.

programme.title: Fun with Okinawa Dialects (R)
programme.desc: Get familiar with Okinawa dialects by listening to folk tales and children's songs.

programme.title: Drama Serial "The Ghost Writer's Wife" Eps. 50 (R)
programme.desc: The 113th Drama Serial, inspired by the lives of Koizumi Setsu and Lafcadio Hearn also known as Koizumi Yakumo, portrays those who were left behind in the rapidly Westernizing Meiji era. At its heart is a woman captivated by ghost stories and her foreign-born husband. Together, they share a life that seems ordinary yet delightfully odd.

programme.title: Natsui Itsuki's Haiku Trip! "Hiroshima" Part 1
programme.desc: Haiku poet Natsui Itsuki sets "Haiku Post" across Japan, and receives "your piece of Haiku"! She selects unique works from among them, and invites the authors of those haiku to share their intentions, memories, and life stories. ROLAND, the King of the Hosts, accompanies her as a partner on the trip.

programme.title: Delicious Japan! (R)
programme.desc: Japan boasts a wide variety of fresh produce and quality food. Find out how and where it's all made. Plus: master chefs reveal their special recipes!

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: TV Exercise

programme.title: Historical Drama "UNBOUND" Eps. 46 (R)
programme.desc: Tsutaju is at an impasse, unable to produce an actor portrait he feels satisfied with. Then, driven by Tei’s heartfelt plea to see a work that only the two of them can create, Utamaro returns to Koshodo. The actor portraits are eventually completed, and on the opening day of the summer performances, he releases 28 prints all at once under the name Toshusai Sharaku. Soon, rumors of Sharaku spread throughout Edo Castle.

programme.title: Special Drama "Mary of Magdalene Restaurant" Part 1
programme.desc: Oikawa Shimon, a chef who has lost everything, drifts into Tsukihate, an imaginary town where those on the brink of life mysteriously gather. There he finds Magdala-ya, a tiny diner on a cliff run by Ria Arima-a mysterious woman with a scar on the neck. Through Ria’s cooking and her unconditional kindness, Shimon begins to reclaim the courage to live. Based on Harada Maha’s novel, this moving drama explores sin, redemption, and the irreplaceable value of life.

programme.desc: Food waste is a major driver of global warming - one institute warns that greenhouse gas emissions from food waste exceed those of nations like India and Russia. We examine the data behind this issue.

programme.desc: A Napping Boy Dreams of Monsters: When a little boy's nap is disturbed by a bad dream, his mother comes to his rescue - we examine a print that shows how much the Edo townspeople cherished their kids.

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4 - EP 302
programme.desc: Embark on a two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all corners of Korea! The 2 Days and 1 Night cast travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of neighbours and beautiful nature.

programme.title: The Return of Superman - EP 598
programme.desc: Witness the parenting challenges of "Superman", the first hero that children encounter when they are born.

programme.title: Our Golden Days - EP 32
programme.desc: Everyone has their golden days, whether now, in the past, or in the future. This heartfelt family melodrama resonates across generations, exploring those dazzling days we all encounter with different meanings.

programme.title: Uncontrollably Fond - EP 11
programme.desc: Uncontrollably Fond is a love story of a man and woman who meet again after they had broken up in the past. The man, in the presence of his death, decides to make her life better as he had destroyed it. Their romance will have you seek comfort, recovery and hope in love.

"Xiaomai's Health Notes" specially collected all the easiest, most practical, cheapest and most efficient ways for all of you. A good day starts with "Xiaomai's Health Notes".

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2696

programme.title: Court Lady - EP 12
programme.desc: Sheng Chumu, son of General Sheng Xiaojing, falls in love with Fu Rou, the daughter of an embroidery merchant. Having confirmed their feelings, the two return to Chang'an. Fu Rou soon becomes a female official, and Sheng Chumu is forced to join the army.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2097
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 24
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The judge declines Lau Yu-fan’s application for an extension of the trial. The police force, ICAC and Department of Justice call a meeting to discuss whether the trial of the Tai Cho-fuk case should be extended so as to prosecute all those involved in collusion between officials and businessmen.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 31
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Three years later, he returned and joins a group of witty partners to seek justice.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2097
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 29
programme.desc: Chi-bun is very worried as Ho-yee declares she is going to find the murder weapon that was used for killing Sau-yi, so he returns to the Yau household to look for the murder weapon. However, police catch him. Chi-bun wants to bring Ka-pik and Hiu-ling along as he flees. But Rio and Ko Tsun intercept him with their car.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 769
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Ye Cheng - EP 4
programme.desc: Shu Cheng (Claire Jia), the daughter of the first aristocratic family, pretends to be a playgirl to conceal her identify. While promoting Shen Ye (Yuan Hao) as a courtesan, she discovers his multiple identities. They have no choice but to work together.

programme.title: Destined - EP 30
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru (Song Yi), the daughter of a cloth merchant who’s suffered childhood hardships, is married off to Gu Jiu Si (Bai Jing Ting), the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.

programme.title: Destined - EP 31
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru (Song Yi), the daughter of a cloth merchant who’s suffered childhood hardships, is married off to Gu Jiu Si (Bai Jing Ting), the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 20
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Tai Wing-keung agrees to become a tainted witness and testify against Tai Cho-fuk. Lau Hok-fan tells Lee Nga-man about the news and Chui Sze-sze’s death. Lee Nga-man is beside herself with grief. She disbands her team and decides to take revenge on Tai Cho-fuk by herself.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 21
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] While covertly tailing Auyeung Kwan, Chow Chun-kit is full of doubts. However, when Chow Chun-kit finds out Auyeung Kwan often misses him at the cha chaan teng where he met Kwong, he believes he is not the mole. But Auyeung Kwan reminds Chow Chun-kit to be wary of Lui Hok-sum’s unusual maneuvers, and in particular, his suspicious behavior and the scheme behind.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 22
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Actually, Lau Yu-fan’s plan is for Chow Chun-kit and Ko Ho-yin to take turns to hold back Tai Cho-fuk so that they have time to prepare legal documents for his arrest and apply for a search warrant for Kin Fung Group. Lau Yu-fan goes to the prison to see Lee Nga-man as he hopes she has some way to make Tai Wing-keung come back to testify against Tai Cho-fuk.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 23
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] After the failed Eagle Nest operation, Lui Hok-sum has been unhappy about Tai Cho-fuk’s high profile. And for several months, ICAC investigation causes Lui Hok-sum to decide to draw a line between himself and Tai Cho-fuk. Lui Hok-sum is suspended from duty as he is under investigation.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 24
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The judge declines Lau Yu-fan’s application for an extension of the trial. The police force, ICAC and Department of Justice call a meeting to discuss whether the trial of the Tai Cho-fuk case should be extended so as to prosecute all those involved in collusion between officials and businessmen.

programme.title: Bad and Crazy - EP 12
programme.desc: The story is about Su Yeol (Lee Dong Wook), a corrupt yet practical detective who manifests a split personality K (Wi Ha Joon) who harbours a sense of justice. Watch how he tries to solve various crimes!

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 30

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2097
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: Mother and Mom - EP 7
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The drama depicts the 'worrying' Daechi-dong life of three generations of women, centered on a passionate working mom Jung Eun (Jeon Hye Jin) and her daughter, as they prepare for the entrance test to enter a famous English academy.

programme.title: Good Job - EP 1
programme.desc: Eun Seon-Woo (Jung Il-Woo) owns the biggest company in Korea and secretly runs a private detective office. Don Se-Ra (Kwon Yuri) was born with hyperacuity and uses it to help people. As the arrogant and the helpful meet to solve cases together, romance blossoms.

programme.title: Always Home - EP 22
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] This youth campus drama tells the story of a group of children who grew up together in a doctors’ residential apartment. They go through all the important milestones in life together, always supporting one another as they study, work, and pursue their dreams.

programme.title: Always Home - EP 23
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] This youth campus drama tells the story of a group of children who grew up together in a doctors’ residential apartment. They go through all the important milestones in life together, always supporting one another as they study, work, and pursue their dreams.

programme.title: Destined - EP 34
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru (Song Yi), the daughter of a cloth merchant who’s suffered childhood hardships, is married off to Gu Jiu Si (Bai Jing Ting), the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.

programme.title: Destined - EP 35
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru (Song Yi), the daughter of a cloth merchant who’s suffered childhood hardships, is married off to Gu Jiu Si (Bai Jing Ting), the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.

programme.title: Mother and Mom - EP 8
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The drama depicts the 'worrying' Daechi-dong life of three generations of women, centered on a passionate working mom Jung Eun (Jeon Hye Jin) and her daughter, as they prepare for the entrance test to enter a famous English academy.

programme.title: Good Job - EP 2
programme.desc: Eun Seon-Woo (Jung Il-Woo) owns the biggest company in Korea and secretly runs a private detective office. Don Se-Ra (Kwon Yuri) was born with hyperacuity and uses it to help people. As the arrogant and the helpful meet to solve cases together, romance blossoms.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 15
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a ‘Fire master’ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING’s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 4
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

programme.title: Get On A Flat - EP 20
programme.desc: Rewind to the 2008 financial crisis and supermarket manager Che Chi-ming (Andrew Lam) hurriedly sells his apartment. Who could have known even though Chi-ming has been chasing after property prices for 14 years, he still cannot get on the property ladder once again. A middle class lifestyle is tragically transformed into a "midlife crisis"._x000D__x000D_Chi-ming’s wife Man Wai (Elena Kong) is obsessed with property ownership. She goes to work as a part-time maid at some luxury home.

programme.title: Battle Against Evil, The - EP 1
programme.desc: General LI (TONG, MICHAEL) of the Chor Kingdom and wizard CHAI (CHAN HO, MOSES) were colleagues under the same mentor. LI killed CHAR when he found out that CHAR was having an affair with his wife SUKI (LEUNG TSAND, JADE). SUKI was ashamed of her affair, so she committed suicide. After she died, CHAI was furious and killed LI. He used bad magic to turn LI’s spirit into a cloud of hatred in order to prevent him from reincarnation.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 8
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 9
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. programme.title: Class of Distinction - EP 12
programme.desc: Hong Kong superstar Leon Lai joins forces with many friends in the entertainment industry to star in the TVB drama "Good Morning Sir," playing a passionate and energetic young teacher who experiences unique challenges in school, family, and relationships.

programme.title: Knot To Treasure - EP 5
programme.desc: Wei (Zhu Jiang), the eldest son of Wei (Chen Jiewen), is wild and untamed. Under family pressure, he finally marries Shan (Zhang Fengni), with whom he has been dating for many years. After their marriage, Yat-sen develops an extramarital affair with Yan (Cui Jiabao), eventually living with her and abandoning Shan. Later, realizing Yan's overly open attitude towards relationships, he decides to pursue Shan again.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 19
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 20
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. programme.title: Defected, The - EP 9
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects.
