programme.title: Defected, The - EP 12
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects.

programme.title: The Bare-footed Kid
programme.desc: A poor, bare-footed young man from the countryside arrives in the city to work with the friend of his dead father. When their dye shop is burnt down by a local strongman, he decides to fight back to protect all of them and save the shop.

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Hong Kong Hong Kong
programme.desc: After moving to Hong Kong, illegal immigrant Mang has no choice but to live in cramped quarters with male migrants who abuse her. In order to attain Hong Kong residency and a better life, she agrees to marry a lonely old carpenter. After her marriage, Mang crosses paths again with her ex-lover, and the two develop a passionate affair...

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: A bad-tempered, womanizing cop who always neglects his wife is shot in the head as he hunts down a drug dealer. Though he miraculously survives, he must depend on his wife to nurse him back to health. During the recovery, he begins to re-evaluate his life and repair the damages of his broken marriage.

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: This third installment of 'The Eye' horror movie series is about the creepy adventures of a group of teenagers who summon spirits by using the ten methods outlined in a mysterious comic book while vacationing in Thailand.

programme.title: Look Out, Officer!
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is a delight in this supernatural action comedy, where a murdered police officer returns from beyond the grave to persuade a rookie cop into avenging his death.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong's toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Love in a Fallen City
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name by the famous novelist Eileen Chang and directed by the equally acclaimed director Ann Hui, this romance story depicts the challenging relationship between an introverted Shanghai divorcee and a cynical Malaysian playboy during the Japanese invasion of Hong Kong in the 1940s. Will the lovers be together in the end?

programme.title: The Chinese Feast
programme.desc: Sun wants to start a new life as a chef in Canada and struggles to learn cooking skills from a restaurant owner, Au. While Sun will represent his restaurant to participate in a cooking competition, his skill is not good enough, and he has to seek help from a legendary master chef in order to win the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: Kill Time
programme.desc: Mak stumbles upon an obscure website "Witch's Zone" when looking for a copy of her dead father's favorite song. The mysterious website only allows one purchase but Mak cannot resist buying one more purple scarf. Not only does the scarf triggers her memories of her father and her first love, it may also be a vital clue in a mysterious murder.

programme.title: Painted Faces
programme.desc: This is based on the real-life story of Master Yu Jim Yuen who strives to run his academy in the 1960s, even as the opera culture is declining. Three young men, Sammo Hung, Jackie Chan and Yuen Biao, are determined to train under Master Yu and undergo extremely tough training before they become three of Hong Kong's biggest stars

programme.title: A Chinese Tall Story
programme.desc: While finding ways to rescue his disciples, Monk Tripitaka meets the lizard imp Mei Yan, the ugliest woman alive. Despite the conflict between good and evil, he falls for Mei Yan who sacrifices herself to save him many times. The Monk breaks his "no killing" rule to save his disciples, and things get more complicated as Princess Galaxy appears...

programme.title: Man Wanted 3
programme.desc: Street kid Dong idolizes Mongkok triad leader Pu Jun and inadvertently joins his gang. When rival Xi Yang seizes control by illicit means, Pu Jun decides to take him down. At the same time, Pu Jun uncovers Dong as a police undercover and banishes him, but Dong sheds his undercover identity to join Pu Jun to seek revenge against Xi Yang.

programme.title: Casino Tycoon II
programme.desc: This is a sequel to "Casino Tycoon". 20 years after Benny Ho established his casino empire in Macau, his former partner becomes envious and plots to bring him down. At the same time, a young man working for Benny is the son of his ex-lover, and is also out to take revenge on him. Ho however, is not about to take things lying down...

programme.title: The Flying Mr. B
programme.desc: Mr. Shi, a secondary PE teacher, accidentally takes a "super pill" invented by the science teacher and gains superpower, turning into Mr. B. He uses his superpower to help the school sports team win the championship and prevent crimes. When the triad is made aware of Mr. B's superpower, they try to gain the super pill for nefarious purposes.

programme.title: Everlasting Love
programme.desc: Young intern doctor Eric meets Pei Jun and quickly falls in love with her, unaware that she works as a hostess in a night club. Despite their social differences, can their love story defy the odds and lead to a happily ever after?

programme.title: Rob-B-Hood
programme.desc: The famous "Gang Trio" is hired to kidnap a baby for 30 million dollars. When they realize that the triad is after both the ransom and the baby's life, they decide to make the hostage their protege. Cornered by cops and threatened by gangsters, the three 'Rob-B-Hood' must put the baby safely back in his cradle.

programme.title: Destiny's Champion
programme.desc: An aging fighter relives the mistakes of his violent past through a poor and streetwise kid, who severely injures his nemesis during a battle to win a girl's heart.

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh
programme.desc: When a young housewife's debt-ridden, philandering husband leaves her with a mountain of tax debts, a security guard is hired by the tax authority to guard the assets, but he starts falling for her instead.

programme.title: Hong Kong Playboys
programme.desc: Sheng is a rich playboy who lives a carefree and fun life with the ladies, until his mother decides that he should get married. Up against other lady killers in his quest to find Miss Right, Sheng must decide what he wants.

programme.title: Long Arm of the Law Part 3
programme.desc: Chinese ex-soldier Li is wrongly accused and seeks refuge in Hong Kong to escape a death sentence. En route, he meets Sam and Moon. While Li has fallen in love with Moon, Hong Kong triad kidnaps Moon and coerces Li into aiding a robbery. Meanwhile, the mainland police officer tracks Li's path to Hong Kong, intensifying the chase.

programme.title: I Love Lolanto
programme.desc: Lolanto, a playboy, is injured and meets the daughter of a tycoon, Man, in the hospital. Man is mentally retarded and makes friends easily with Lolanto hence Man's father hires him to take care of her. However, as Man goes through treatments and recovers, her feelings for Lolanto also changes...

programme.title: Teenage Dreamers
programme.desc: Ting Ting is a student in an all-girl high school. She tries out for the school's stage production of Romeo and Juliet with an all-boy school and promptly falls for the lead, Jackson. While Ting Ting is swept away by the excitement of her first love, Jackson turns out to be more of a player than a partner.

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: A heroic tale about Hong Kong's brave firefighters. These courageous men can march into disastrous firegrounds and risk their lives to save others. However, do they have the same courage to confront their personal issues?

programme.title: Law Or Justice
programme.desc: Lawyer Yip defends a rapist and gets him acquitted. Yip's boyfriend Fong, a police inspector, knows he is guilty and despises Yip for not upholding justice. The victim's sister takes revenge by spiking the rapist's drink but is raped instead. This puts the rapist back in court. Will Yip choose to uphold law or justice this time?

programme.title: How to Pick Girls Up !
programme.desc: Xin, a helpless loser in love, calls in to a radio show hosted by DJ Tsang to ask desperately for help. A self-proclaimed love expert, Tsang takes it upon himself to make sure Xin meets girls and leads him on a series of absurd excursions into the wild and dangerous world of modern love.

programme.title: Prince Charming
programme.desc: Chen Li Pin, the nerdy son of a business tycoon, and his friend seek love in Hawaii. Returning home in disappointment, they accidentally find themselves in a messy identity swap. It is at this time that Chen falls for a beautiful girl May, who thinks he is a company chauffeur...

programme.title: Mr Vampire
programme.desc: Taoist priest Kou is assigned to re-bury a rich man, in the hope that the new tomb will bring further prosperity. When the corpse turns into a vampire and wreaks havoc in the village, his disciples are also hurt by the vampire and possessed by a female ghost respectively. How can Kou save his disciples and hunt down the vampire at the same time?

programme.title: Mr. Possessed
programme.desc: Riley is cursed by an evil spirit to not be able to approach any woman. When he falls in love with Siu Yu, Riley's mother decides to use her to help him vanquish the evil spirit. On their wedding night, Riley passes out after protecting Siu Yu from the attack of the evil spirit. Can the two finally break the curse?

programme.title: Killers On Wheels
programme.desc: Kuo takes his family to an outlying island of Hong Kong for a vacation. On the ferry, they meet a group of young hooligans cum motorcyclists called the "speed gang", led by Johnny, and Kuo's sister Carrie is molested by Johnny's brother Michael. Kuo's family continues to be harassed by the "speed gang" while on the island - can Kuo protect them?

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Threatened by the Yuan who are closing in to rule the whole of China, a band of Song survivors band together to save their prime minister. This bold and fearless heroes fighting for their cause are led by international star, Lo Lieh (Glass Tears, Killer Clans) and Shi Szu (Lovers Destiny), who must fight their way out of trap after trap. But they can't escape them all, and eventually the two end up in prison... it is either death or a fight to the end!

programme.title: The Voyage of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: Shaolin Intruders
programme.desc: On a routine courier mission, the prestigious Chief was murdered by four mysterious monks. When all evidence pointed to Ching Hua, his friend Lei decides to clear his name by barging in the Shaolin Temple thrice. When Lei thought justice was served for the culprits, he soon realizes the table had turned and the monks stroke again. What follows is a series of intense pursuit for the ultimate villain!

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: Heroes of the East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriend's baby...

programme.title: The Trail of the Broken Blade
programme.desc: After avenging his father's death by assassinating a high official, Li Yue disappears into hiding as a fugitive. His fiancee enlists a swordsman-who secretly loves her-to search for him, unaware that the bandit Xiao Mei has also fallen for Li Yue. Their intertwined love quadrangle explores themes of sacrifice, devotion and selfless love.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insider's look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiang's popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his son's arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women only give birth to baby girls and do so by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperor's sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: King Gambler
programme.desc: This film was actually a lively forerunner to the gambling film craze, which eventually swept Asian cinema. Here, it's cardsharp versus cardsharp with a lot more kung-fu action, in a battle of wits and fists to become the king of the casino. The double stings and triple crosses raise in complexity and imagination until what started as an unusual box office risk became a top ten hit of 1976.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed "The Invincible Fist" is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Chang's. On the Chang's farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A group of farmers who are being oppressed by the local magistrates kidnap one of the magistrate's daughter in the hope of being heard by the authorities. A wandering swordsman offers his help and aiding him are two fighters who have both switched sides from being the oppressors to the oppressed. The trio fight back against the magistrates!

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman and coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: In this classic romantic melodrama, nightclub songstress Qing Qing falls for the handsome Peng Nan. However, the two go through an emotional roller coaster of misunderstandings, separations and mutual torment. When the two finally fall back into love, Qing Qing receives a shocking revelation that brings the story to its inevitable sad ending.

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: The Sword Master passes on his sword to his disciple Lin before he dies. However, Lin soon discovers that another disciple Fang also eyes the sword and plots to take it away from Lin, destroying his family and blinding him in the process. Finally, Lin battles Fang for revenge and vows to reclaim his sword.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor's death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Clan Of The White Lotus
programme.desc: The head of White Lotus Clan, Lo, is a highly skilled martial artist who supports the Qing government and helps destroy the rebellion group. Hung from Shaolin who kills Lo's brother, is being hunted and hides in another rebel Hu's house. The clan attacks at night killing Hu and his sister, but Hung manages to get Hu's pregnant wife to safety.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Qi Ming Xing, an assassin of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to quit the clan. When hunted by the clan, he is saved by Swordsman Zhuo Yi Fan. Zhuo accidentally discovers that Qi is the killer of his wife, but forgives him after knowing Qi's guilt over her death. The two finally team up to destroy the evil clan.

programme.title: Forbidden Tales of Two Cities
programme.desc: Li Han-hsiang wrote and directed this charming and fascinating comedy, Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities. The two cities in the picture are Macau, where a love quartet is a morally-unsound source for sexual entertainment; and Hong Kong, where a woman enters a gambler's apartment to find four shackles hanging from his ceiling to aid in kinky activities.

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: Discover New Taiwan Step By Step
programme.desc: The creative production team goes around Taiwan in search of inspiring stories in the country. Get to know more unique individuals and discover the true spirit of Taiwan.

programme.title: Citizens' Subjects
programme.desc: Citizens' Subjects utilizes the perspective of Taiwan people and Taiwan events to tell the stories of Taiwan. It takes a light-hearted, humorous approach to interpreting current affairs.

programme.title: Battle ATM
programme.desc: Creating a brand-new interactive ATM that combined with puzzle solving and daily life! Guests can win money by taking three rounds of intellectual challenges from the ATM, turn wisdom into money! Futuristic program scenes with video game clearing concept, where challengers engage in the intellectual competition to switch on the ATM. Those who won goes to the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: Global Focus
programme.desc: Bringing you the latest political, economy, information technology and breaking news around the world.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.desc: Super Taste focuses on funny travel style to discover destinations and local-dishes. Standing on audience's view point, program's hosts introduce every sightseeing sites with close-witness, young and humorous way to announce the spirits of Super Taste.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.desc: A news programme that provides the latest Taiwan and international news, as well as in-depth analyses of important issues around the world.

programme.desc: The 7 individuals were all involved in the heated case of a missing girl. As they attempt to escape their fate and pursue the truth, they find themselves embroiled in secrets, lies, and desires in this retribution tale.

programme.title: Mr Player - EP 70
programme.desc: Get ready for some serious fun with one of Taiwan's most popular outdoor variety shows! Golden Bell Award-winning hosts Jacky Wu and KID travel all over Taiwan and other parts of the world alongside celebrity guests to compete in races and complete missions.

programme.title: World's No. 1: Philippines - EP 3
programme.desc: Dive into The World's No.1: Philippines, an exhilarating journey through a nation bursting with color, flavor, and life! From bustling street markets and fiery kitchens to hidden natural wonders and heartwarming local stories, every stop unveils the true spirit and irresistible charm of the Philippines.

programme.title: Top Star - EP 7
programme.desc: Top Star showcases battles akin to grand concerts, with intense clashes amplifying musical prowess, culminating in a versatile, well-rounded singing sensation.

programme.title: Perfect Match - EP 53
programme.desc: Perfect Match is a highly-rated large-scale dating variety show that connects eligible bachelors to bachelorettes in China. Be thoroughly entertained by the sharp and witty Meng Fei, one of the top hosts for shows of this genre, as he presents a unique and humorous approach to interactions between all the participants.

programme.desc: Get ready for some serious fun with one of Taiwan's most popular outdoor variety shows! Golden Bell Award-winning hosts Jacky Wu and KID travel all over Taiwan and other parts of the world alongside celebrity guests to compete in races and complete missions.

programme.title: The Big Call
programme.desc: Dastardly phone scammers are stealing millions from people from all walks of life. Altruistic young policeman Ding stealthily combines forces with a highly skilled female undercover agent to stop them.

programme.title: Sound Trek 2025 - EP 4
programme.desc: A stage for the bold, a dream for the fearless! Sound Trek gathers aspiring talents ready to shine. From folk to pop to bel canto, their voices ignite the stage. Who will deliver the stunning debut that captures it all?

programme.title: The Hunger Games - EP 73
programme.desc: The hungriest and most ruthless food competition ever! In this groundbreaking show, contestants must embrace the challenge of conquering their hunger to become the ultimate winner. With a relentless pursuit of zero hunger, only the strongest will emerge victorious!

programme.title: Warm on a Cold Night - EP 10
programme.desc: Qian Kingdom's constable Su Jiu Er (Li Yi Tong) possesses a rabbit-like cold-skinned spirit. She meets wolf-like warm-spirited Han Zheng (Bi Wen Jun) from Qi Kingdom's ruling family. This unusual duo forms a close bond as they investigate a strange murder.

programme.desc: Join James, the host with outstanding culinary skills and an appetite for good food, as he explores markets and savours local delicacies in Taiwan!

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go - EP 256
programme.desc: This large-scale variety show gathers showbiz entertainers to challenge each other in various hilarious educational games. Viewers at home are also encouraged to get in on the fun and try out the games with friends in real life!

programme.title: Divas Hit the Road 7 - EP 11
programme.desc: Join Na Ying and a lively team of seven as they dive into a 25 day Silk Road trip filled with cultural encounters, heartfelt moments, and self-discovery, bringing Chinese culture to life on a global stage.

programme.desc: A stage for the bold, a dream for the fearless! Sound Trek gathers aspiring talents ready to shine. From folk to pop to bel canto, their voices ignite the stage. Who will deliver the stunning debut that captures it all?

programme.title: Subtle Flavors - EP 2
programme.desc: Embark on a food journey across Sichuan, Hunan, and Guangdong. From time-honored recipes to innovative twists, discover the tastes that carry deep cultural roots and heartfelt stories.

programme.title: Perfect Match - EP 54
programme.desc: Perfect Match is a highly-rated large-scale dating variety show that connects eligible bachelors to bachelorettes in China. Be thoroughly entertained by the sharp and witty Meng Fei, one of the top hosts for shows of this genre, as he presents a unique and humorous approach to interactions between all the participants.

programme.title: Call Me By Fire 5 - EP 14
programme.desc: A brand-new, high-stakes format "Alliance Battles with Group Elimination" kicks off this season. Seven teams are divided into two alliances, sharing votes within each. The alliance with the lowest total votes will see an entire team eliminated. A gripping battle of passion, teamwork, and perseverance unfolds among the brothers. Who will rise, and who will fall?

programme.title: Warm on a Cold Night - EP 12
programme.desc: Qian Kingdom's constable Su Jiu Er (Li Yi Tong) possesses a rabbit-like cold-skinned spirit. She meets wolf-like warm-spirited Han Zheng (Bi Wen Jun) from Qi Kingdom's ruling family. This unusual duo forms a close bond as they investigate a strange murder.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go - EP 257
programme.desc: This large-scale variety show gathers showbiz entertainers to challenge each other in various hilarious educational games. Viewers at home are also encouraged to get in on the fun and try out the games with friends in real life!

programme.title: Sound Trek 2025 - EP 5
programme.desc: A stage for the bold, a dream for the fearless! Sound Trek gathers aspiring talents ready to shine. From folk to pop to bel canto, their voices ignite the stage. Who will deliver the stunning debut that captures it all?

programme.title: The White Storm 2 - Drug Lords
programme.desc: Former triad brothers turned bitter enemies collide when Yu, a reformed tycoon, offers a billion-dollar bounty on Hong Kong's most powerful drug lord. As chaos engulfs the city, Inspector Fung races against time to stop a brutal war between vengeance, justice, and the underworld.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 769
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Moonshine - EP 2
programme.desc: The drama tells a story of love and desire during the period of strictest alcohol prohibition in late Joseon era, centering on four youths stepping over the line.

programme.title: Duel on Mount Hua - Nine Yin True Sutra - EP 7
programme.desc: Nine Yin True Sutra - [With English and Chinese subtitles] Set in a reimagined Jin Yong martial arts world, this series is divided into four chapters. Heroes from across the martial world gather at Mount Hua, fiercely competing for the ultimate martial arts supremacy.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2097
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 24
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The judge declines Lau Yu-fan’s application for an extension of the trial. The police force, ICAC and Department of Justice call a meeting to discuss whether the trial of the Tai Cho-fuk case should be extended so as to prosecute all those involved in collusion between officials and businessmen.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 31
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Three years later, he returned and joins a group of witty partners to seek justice.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2097
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 29
programme.desc: Chi-bun is very worried as Ho-yee declares she is going to find the murder weapon that was used for killing Sau-yi, so he returns to the Yau household to look for the murder weapon. However, police catch him. Chi-bun wants to bring Ka-pik and Hiu-ling along as he flees. But Rio and Ko Tsun intercept him with their car.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 769
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Ye Cheng - EP 4
programme.desc: Shu Cheng (Claire Jia), the daughter of the first aristocratic family, pretends to be a playgirl to conceal her identify. While promoting Shen Ye (Yuan Hao) as a courtesan, she discovers his multiple identities. They have no choice but to work together.

programme.title: Destined - EP 30
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru (Song Yi), the daughter of a cloth merchant who’s suffered childhood hardships, is married off to Gu Jiu Si (Bai Jing Ting), the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.

programme.title: Destined - EP 31
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru (Song Yi), the daughter of a cloth merchant who’s suffered childhood hardships, is married off to Gu Jiu Si (Bai Jing Ting), the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 20
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Tai Wing-keung agrees to become a tainted witness and testify against Tai Cho-fuk. Lau Hok-fan tells Lee Nga-man about the news and Chui Sze-sze’s death. Lee Nga-man is beside herself with grief. She disbands her team and decides to take revenge on Tai Cho-fuk by herself.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 21
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] While covertly tailing Auyeung Kwan, Chow Chun-kit is full of doubts. However, when Chow Chun-kit finds out Auyeung Kwan often misses him at the cha chaan teng where he met Kwong, he believes he is not the mole. But Auyeung Kwan reminds Chow Chun-kit to be wary of Lui Hok-sum’s unusual maneuvers, and in particular, his suspicious behavior and the scheme behind.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 22
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Actually, Lau Yu-fan’s plan is for Chow Chun-kit and Ko Ho-yin to take turns to hold back Tai Cho-fuk so that they have time to prepare legal documents for his arrest and apply for a search warrant for Kin Fung Group. Lau Yu-fan goes to the prison to see Lee Nga-man as he hopes she has some way to make Tai Wing-keung come back to testify against Tai Cho-fuk.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 23
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] After the failed Eagle Nest operation, Lui Hok-sum has been unhappy about Tai Cho-fuk’s high profile. And for several months, ICAC investigation causes Lui Hok-sum to decide to draw a line between himself and Tai Cho-fuk. Lui Hok-sum is suspended from duty as he is under investigation.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 24
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The judge declines Lau Yu-fan’s application for an extension of the trial. The police force, ICAC and Department of Justice call a meeting to discuss whether the trial of the Tai Cho-fuk case should be extended so as to prosecute all those involved in collusion between officials and businessmen.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2096
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: Mother and Mom - EP 6
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The drama depicts the 'worrying' Daechi-dong life of three generations of women, centered on a passionate working mom Jung Eun (Jeon Hye Jin) and her daughter, as they prepare for the entrance test to enter a famous English academy.

programme.title: Bad and Crazy - EP 12
programme.desc: The story is about Su Yeol (Lee Dong Wook), a corrupt yet practical detective who manifests a split personality K (Wi Ha Joon) who harbours a sense of justice. Watch how he tries to solve various crimes!

programme.title: Always Home - EP 20
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] This youth campus drama tells the story of a group of children who grew up together in a doctors’ residential apartment. They go through all the important milestones in life together, always supporting one another as they study, work, and pursue their dreams.

programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Three years later, he returned and joins a group of witty partners to seek justice.

programme.title: Mother and Mom - EP 7
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The drama depicts the 'worrying' Daechi-dong life of three generations of women, centered on a passionate working mom Jung Eun (Jeon Hye Jin) and her daughter, as they prepare for the entrance test to enter a famous English academy.

programme.title: Good Job - EP 1
programme.desc: Eun Seon-Woo (Jung Il-Woo) owns the biggest company in Korea and secretly runs a private detective office. Don Se-Ra (Kwon Yuri) was born with hyperacuity and uses it to help people. As the arrogant and the helpful meet to solve cases together, romance blossoms.
